title: Delicious and moist fresh cream chocolate fudge cake
ingredients: ['175g self-raising flour', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '150g caster sugar', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '2 eggs, beaten', '150ml sunflower oil', '150ml semi-skimmed milk', 'For the buttercream icing', '75g unsalted butter', '175g icing sugar', '3 tablespoons cocoa powder', 'a drop of milk', 'For the filling', '300ml double cream', '25g caster sugar']
